resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102945</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102945</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205689</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The American Variety Stage: Vaudeville and Popular Entertainment, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Amerikanische Vielzahl-Stadium: 
Vaudeville und populäre Unterhaltung, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Étape Américaine de Variété : 
Vaudeville et divertissement populaire, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Estágio Americano Da Variedade: 
Vaudeville e entertainment popular, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Fase Americana Di Varietà: Vaudeville ed
intrattenimento popolare, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αμερικανικό στάδιο ποικιλίας: Επιθεώρηση και 
δημοφιλής ψυχαγωγία, 1870-1920</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Etapa Americana De la Variedad: 
Vaudeville y hospitalidad popular, 1870-1920</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a multimedia anthology illustrating the vibrant and diverse forms of popular entertainment, especially vaudeville, that thrived from 1870-1920. Included are 334 English- and Yiddish-language playscripts, 146 theater playbills and programs, 61 motion pictures, 10 sound recordings and 143 photographs and 29 memorabilia items documenting the life and career of Harry Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Multimediaanthologie, welche die vibrant 
und verschiedenen Formulare der populären Unterhaltung, besonders 
vaudeville veranschaulicht, das von 1870-1920 vorwärtskam. Sind
334 englische und Yiddish-Spracheplayscripts, 146 Theaterplaybills und
-programme, 61 Bewegung Abbildungen, 10 Tonaufnahmen und 143 
Fotographien und 29 Erinnerungsstückeinzelteile enthalten, die das 
Leben und die Karriere von Harry Houdini dokumentieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une anthologie de multimédia illustrant les 
formes vibrantes et diverses du divertissement populaire, 
particulièrement le vaudeville, qui a prospéré de 1870-1920. 
Inclus sont 334 playscripts anglais- et d'Yiddish-langage, 146 
playbills et programmes de théâtre, 61 films cinématographiques, 10
enregistrements sonores et 143 photographies et 29 éléments de 
évènements mémorables documentant la vie et la carrière de Harry 
Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um anthology dos multimedia que ilustra os 
formulários vibrant e diversos do entertainment popular, especial o 
vaudeville, que prosperou de 1870-1920. Incluídos são 334 
playscripts ingleses e da Yiddish-língua, 146 playbills e programas 
do teatro, 61 retratos de movimento, 10 gravações sadias e 143 
fotografias e 29 artigos dos memorabilia documentando a vida e a 
carreira de Harry Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un'antologia di multimedia che illustra le 
forme vibrant e varie di intrattenimento popolare, particolarmente 
vaudeville, che ha prosperato da 1870-1920. Inclusi sono 334 
playscripts di Yiddish-linguaggio ed inglesi, 146 playbills e 
programmi del teatro, 61 cinema, 10 registrazioni del suono e 143 
fotografie e 29 articoli dei memorabilia documentanti la vita e la 
carriera di Harry Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια ανθολογία πολυμέσων που επεξηγεί τις 
δονούμενες και διαφορετικές μορφές της δημοφιλούς ψυχαγωγίας, 
ειδικά επιθεώρηση, η οποία αναπτύχτηκε από 1870-1920. 
συμπεριλαμβανόμενος είναι 334 Αγγλος - και γίντις-γλώσσα 
playscripts, θέατρο 146 playbills και προγράμματα, 61 
ταινίες, 10 υγιείς καταγραφές και 143 φωτογραφίες και 29 
αντικείμενα αναμνηστικών τεκμηριώνοντας τη ζωή και τη 
σταδιοδρομία Harry Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una antología de las multimedias que ilustra 
las formas vibrantes y diversas de hospitalidad popular, 
especialmente el vaudeville, que prosperó a partir de 1870-1920. 
Incluidos son 334 playscripts ingleses y del Yiddish-lenguaje, 
146 playbills y programas del teatro, 61 películas, 10 grabaciones de
sonidos y 143 fotografías y 29 items de los memorabilia documentando 
la vida y la carrera de Harry Houdini.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205689</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102945</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-american-variety-stage-vaudeville-and-popular-entertainment-1870-1920</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
